title: Kiko the kangaroo: hail the king
creator_credit: George Gordon, Mannie Davis, Paul Terry, Terrytoons and Castle Films
brief_description: Kiko cooks a chicken for the king who has just been coronated but unfortunately the king disapproves and Kiko is sent off to the tower as punishment. Or is this all just a dream! No dialogue - music soundtrack only.
creator_credit_for_label: George Gordon, Mannie Davis, Paul Terry, Terrytoons and Castle Films
